      • doesQRCodeExist

        public void doesQRCodeExist​(QRCode qrCode,
                            RepositoryCallback<com.google.firebase.firestore.DocumentSnapshot> repositoryCallback)
        Get a qr code document in Firestore. The criteria for equivalence is based on https://eclass.srv.ualberta.ca/mod/forum/discuss.php?d=2203362#p5702650 Where a QRCode with location will be treated as a different QRCode with location even if their hash is the same. Returns A QRCode document reference in the callback if qr code exist in the callback.
        Parameters:
        qrCode - The qr code to be checked against

      • getQRCode

        public void getQRCode​(java.lang.String qrCodeId,
                      RepositoryCallback<QRCode> repositoryCallback)
        Gets a qr code given the id of the qr code Returns a QR Code object in the callback
        Parameters:
        qrCodeId - The id of the qr code

      • getScannedQRCodes

        Parameters:
        player - The player to be checked against

      • getScannedBy
